data.message: So i was thinking about life. And i came across a problem: your CD. Is called. Revival. And. And. Your other ones. R+ R now. R. Man am i a pirate? Ok. But. Ok. I don't no the strongest person that wouldn't. Ok. But. Revile. Is. Kinda like your words opposite. So i wouldnt get to caught up in being super up or just even plane human. God and Jesus arnt human. Even if you could be an angel from heaven. and if there put on earth to help people they would be put here to feel emotion. So they feel human emotion. And thats hard. Emotions are tough. But. If you just make yourself happy. Then anyone willing to give you the slightest time of day. Will be happy too or they can fuck off. .... Ignore me.
